author: ate
msg: RAVE-437: Check and cleanup of NOTICE files to only include 3rd party usages which require a (separate) notice.
Remove notices for Guice, Guava, OAuth Core, Caja, Closure Compiler, Java Inject, Protocol Buffers (all hosted on google code).
None of these require a separate notice (as they don't provide one themselves) and/or their respective license is already bundled in the separate LICENSE file providing the needed notice.
